original_text: Now I am telling you this: I was talking about people who say that they are believers. If they say that, but they have sex in a wrong way, do not be friends with them. It is the same if they want many things for themselves. They may worship idols. They may insult people. They may often get drunk. They may deceive people and rob them. If one of your own group does things like that, do not even agree to eat a meal with them. 12-
korean_text: 이제 내가 너희에게 쓴 것은 만일 어떤 형제라 일컫는 자가 음행하거나 탐욕을 부리거나 우상 숭배를 하거나 모욕하거나 술 취하거나 속여 빼앗거든 사귀지도 말고 그런 자와는 함께 먹지도 말라 함이라

sentences.original_text: Now I am telling you this:
I was talking about people who say that they are believers.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 믿는 자라고 말하는 사람들에 대해 말하고 있었다.

sentences.original_text: If they say that, but they have sex in a wrong way,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 그렇게 말하지만, 잘못된 방식으로 성관계를 가진다면,

sentences.original_text: do not be friends with them.
It is the same if they want many things for themselves.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 자신을 위해 많은 것을 원해도 마찬가지다.
그들은 자주 술에 취할 수 있다.

sentences.original_text: They may deceive people and rob them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사람들을 속이고 그들에게서 물건을 훔칠 수 있다.

sentences.original_text: If one of your own group does things like that,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 너희 그룹 중 한 명이 그런 일을 한다면,

sentences.original_text: do not even agree to eat a meal with them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 함께 식사하는 것에 동의조차 하지 마라.
